data.name: Hide Youtube Thought Crime Box ("Clarify Box")
data.description:
The simplest one-line piece of CSS to combat another technology company that is trying to act like Big Brother. 

Do you want to cite evidence about environmental companies lying in order to push Global Warming narratives to gain government subsidies? Are you one of the few non-normies aware of the error in the original CO2 equation (by its very creator)? Do you want to be an insane person who sees the curvature of the Earth but still call it flat? And do you want to view any of this kind of content on Youtube, for fun or research, without being coddled like a child?

Remove the "clarify box" below YT videos. One less piece of Big Brother.

data.name: OLX - Quite Dark
data.description:
The new dark style for OLX #multilang (ad remove included)

Feel free to contribute the project on Github: https://github.com/pawelos076232/OLX-QuiteDark
data.css:
@-moz-document regexp("https?://(|www.)olx.(bg|pl|pt|ro|ua|)/((?!bezpieczenstwo|advertising|topfeature|payment|plata-prin-olx|livrare-cu-verificare|courier|safetyuser|mobile|mobilne).*)"){/*!

data.name: Wikipedia mild theme, hand-picked colours
data.description:
Light gray colour palette for Wikipedia sites.
Supports Timeless (most modern) and Vector (default) skins.

data.name: Wikipedia dark theme, hand-picked colours
data.description:
Discord-like colour theme for Wikipedia sites.
Supports Timeless (most modern) and Vector (default) skins.

data.name: Chaturbate Dark Theme (Beta)
data.description:
A dark theme for Chaturbate.
Make sure to add the fitting URL of your chaturbate domain.
